storyInfo: After finding himself manipulated by Reynell multiple times and under pressure from the Coalition government, El Capitán finds himself at the end of his rope. He makes up his mind and unleashes a most cruel plan.

attributes.content: Booker, is something the matter?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Ms. Candela, the Captain is growing restless.
attributes.name: Mayor's Bodyguard

attributes.content: Reynell's toyed with him for so long, and he's restless only now?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Our man just sent word. He's planning to use violence to deal with the street art community.
attributes.name: Mayor's Bodyguard

attributes.content: Violence in my domain? Where did he find the guts?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Someone in the Coalition government supports him. He has the power to deploy all of the Coalition's military resources within the city.
attributes.name: Mayor's Bodyguard

attributes.content: Well, these bastards are certainly learning to extend their reach...
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Should we do something to stop this plan of his?
attributes.name: Mayor's Bodyguard

attributes.content: Let's not, for the time being. That art community's always been a whimsical bunch, making trouble for the city government. They'd be doing me a favor if they managed to take care of our problems there.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: But you need to keep a close eye on them. Mateo's a short-sighted and greedy man. With this much power in his hands, I doubt his intentions will stay all that pure.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: That aside, Ms. Candela, will you be attending the Galería Krysztauowa's opening ceremony in a few days?
attributes.name: Mayor's Bodyguard

attributes.content: *sigh*... Another boy who loves looking for trouble... I'll pass. Have someone send a congratulatory gift.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Please excuse me, then.
attributes.name: Mayor's Bodyguard

attributes.content: Wait a moment. I have something else I need Ernesto to take care of for me. Remember to pass this on to him.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Reynell, do you remember me? We met a few years ago.
attributes.name: Eager Investor
Reynell
attributes.content: Yes, you're... Hold on, don't remind me. It's on the tip of my tongue.

attributes.name: Reynell
attributes.content: Mr. Norris, right? We bid on the same Minoan statue three years ago.
attributes.joined: Yes, you're... Hold on, don't remind me. It's on the tip of my tongue.Mr. Norris, right? We bid on the same Minoan statue three years ago.

attributes.content: Your excellent memory has left a profound impression on me. You kept talking about the statue that night. You recalled even the prior collectors who had owned the piece.
attributes.name: Eager Investor

attributes.content: Right. That's one of my qualities... Remembering just about everything.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: It's been a while, but you've changed a lot. You're much more like your father, now that you've matured.
attributes.name: Eager Investor

attributes.content: It's too bad he left us all too soon, before he could see all that I'm accomplishing now.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Don't be sad. Even if he isn't here to witness it, he's no doubt proud that his son's achievements are exceeding his own.
attributes.name: Eager Investor

attributes.content: Heh... I sure hope so.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Mr. Kowalski, I've been looking for you.
attributes.name: Adulating Collector

attributes.content: Hey, Chetty, how have you been? An Iberian fresco just made it into the exhibition hall downstairs. You've been going all across the world this past year collecting these masterpieces, haven't you?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: That was last year. This year, I'm planning on buying as many Yanese ink wash paintings as I can.
attributes.name: Adulating Collector

attributes.content: I didn't expect your investment outlook to change so quickly.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: You're getting the wrong idea, Reynell. It's not our outlook that's changing quickly. It's Mr. Chetty whose mind is changing all the time.
attributes.name: Eager Investor

attributes.content: Sounds like fun.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: (Quietly) He just remarried this year. From what I hear, the lady is very into ink wash paintings.
attributes.name: Eager Investor

attributes.content: On that note, let me get straight to the point, Mr. Kowalski.
attributes.name: Adulating Collector

attributes.content: I want to get rid of those frescoes, and fast. Do you know a way to clear them out? Mary isn't keen to keep Catherine's collection.
attributes.name: Adulating Collector

attributes.content: I should be able to facilitate that. I'll do what I can.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Please, don't be so humble. You're Szczepan Kowalski's son. Years ago, your father took less than two weeks to round up all my...
attributes.name: Adulating Collector

attributes.content: Oh, sorry, Mr. Reynell. I didn't know you were standing there.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: What's your problem, woman? Don't you see the three of us?
attributes.name: Adulating Collector

attributes.content: Gentlemen, this is my bodyguard. I will reprimand her in a moment.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Do you maybe need a change of clothes?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Of course I do. I can't stand around drenched in wine. Please excuse me, gentlemen.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Thanks for that. If one more person had approached me there, I would've suffocated to death.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: No need to thank me. Just doing my job.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I thought you wouldn't be here today. The art community's puppet show is tomorrow. There must be lots to take care of there?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Our contract is still in effect.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: What a touching spirit of obligation... So, what about after it comes to an end? Where will you go?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: What's that on your back...?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Oh, my scars? Nothing to worry about. Just the price I paid for certain betrayals.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Once the contract is over... we'll leave Dossoles and search for our lost teammates.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: In that case, I guess it's not likely we'll meet again.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: With a stubborn employer like me, if it wasn't for the contract, you would've left long ago, right?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I'm something of a troublesome employee too. I'm pretty surprised that you've managed to put up with me all this time.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Thank you for your help. I hope everything works out for you in the future, Mr. Reynell.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You didn't bring me a gift, did you?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Yeah, an album. I bought it from an artist at the community.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: The name here seems to ring a bell... Oh, I remember now. He wrote a 27-minute song last year just to curse at me.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I didn't know that... I just thought that you should take a listen to his songs.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: No matter. No need to fret. I already got my revenge.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: What did you do?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I bought out the rights to a fair number of his songs from his previous company. Then, I gave them to the band he reviles most to cover.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I'll leave the album here. If you want to listen to it, knock yourself out. If not, then so be it.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Yes... He did indeed rip out the phone line when I called a few days ago.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Please give me a little more time. I will do whatever it takes to get my hands on that plot of land... Our development project will move ahead as scheduled.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Sir, I'm sure you know how loyal I am. It's not that I don't care, but this is a little tricky.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: The businessman who has development rights there isn't being very cooperative. We can go soft or go hard on him, but it won't matter.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: I've tried going straight to the community myself, but the people there are tough to crack. We've tried, and failed.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: No, it's not an excuse. It really is where things stand right now. Besides... It seems there is another faction within the Coalition government that's backing Reynell. I don't want to be rash here.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Yes, I'm incompetent for not having found anything on them. This is why, if I may be so bold, I'd like to ask if you have... any clues at all? Say... Who would want to steal this slice of pie from your hands?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: No, I'm not questioning your position within the Coalition at all. It's just a possibility.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: You want me to proceed without a care to this... I-Is this really okay? If I offend anyone with these actions...
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Very well, if you say so. I won't betray your expectations.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Capitán, not even that gentleman knows who they are?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: He doesn't, but he also doesn't care. He gave me the highest command in Dossoles, hinting that I must take care of this quickly.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: What about Candela?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: He says he will take care of her.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: If we have his full support, then this will surely be solved without issue, but you... you don't seem very happy?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Think about it. What kind of subordinate needs his superior's full support to finish something?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: A trusted one?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Hmph... It's a useless one, of course.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: I was hoping to put on a great performance bringing this development plan to fruition, but now he'll probably just think of me as an idiot who needs him to clean my messes.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Once we get that plot of land and all this over with, he might just not care anymore.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: I wouldn't be so sure of that. He's got this kid working for him who's been rising through the ranks. Supposedly, he's sending him here.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: If I don't want to be replaced, I have to do more than get my hands on that land. I need some extra accomplishments.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Do you have any ideas?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Of course, and I've had this in mind for some time now. Reynell's been jerking me around like I'm a fool. If I don't return the favor, that would just make me a wimp.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Now if I could swallow up his art museum, too...
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: There are two days until his opening ceremony. With this little time...
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Looks like I'll have to take the cruelest, riskiest route for this.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Weird... This is too weird...
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Ernesto, I saw the garage lights on. You haven't gone to bed?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Arleta? Come in.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Still working on the community stuff? Everyone's been so busy the last couple days.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: *sigh*... If only. I'd be so much more passionate... I'm working on repaying a favor.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: The favor from finding the medicine last time? Anything I can help with?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: What are you talking about? No, it's a personal thing.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Brother, don't try to do everything on your own. If you need me for anything, let me know before it's too late.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Relax. It's nothing big at all. You should go get some rest.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Whatever... You've always been like this, keeping just about everything to yourself and never showing even a hint of what you're thinking. Nobody can help you at all.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: You're overthinking it, Arleta.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: How's this overthinking it? You keep acting like that, of course this is what I'm gonna think. I'm going. You get some rest soon.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Deep breath)
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Letting you help out isn't the same as letting you get involved in this mess. Don't blame me for this one.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Weird. How did such a large shipment of explosives disappear without a trace as soon as it entered the city?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: There's another shipment on the 28th... and another one on the 3rd of next month...
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: There were also a few shipments of brewing ingredients around the same time. Is that how they made it in? No, the routes don't match up. There were four inspection checkpoints. There's no way they could've gotten through without being discovered.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Unless... the shipments were never going to be inspected in the first place.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: So precious that no one dared to check them?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Luxuries... Fine wine?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: That's... not precious enough. Probably something that could easily fetch hundreds of millions of dollars?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: (Gulps)
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: No... I have to go check out this Galería Krysztauowa.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Door

attributes.content: Oh, what's going on? You've been holed up here, crying the whole time?
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Door

attributes.content: Luck hasn't been on my side today... I came across all these weird transpositions. What's the bass clef? I'm a trumpeter! What the hell was the composer thinking?
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Door

attributes.content: It only occurred to me when the rehearsal began that my score has a long multirest with only a couple notes in between here and there.
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Door

attributes.content: Was there a grace note above the rest?
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Door

attributes.content: No... It's just a bunch of whole rests over a hundred measures in a row. I counted all the way up, and I realized I must've miscounted because I entered too soon.
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Door

attributes.content: It was a very loud note. Everyone stopped and looked at me... Does whoever wrote the music know what a trumpet is?
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Door

attributes.content: *sigh*... Get some rest. Tomorrow will be better...
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Door

attributes.content: You sure...?
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Door

attributes.content: Our arts festival is tomorrow... Gah... I'm so nervous.
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Window

attributes.content: If you can't sleep, mind helping me work on my draft?
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Window

attributes.content: I thought you finished your draft a long time ago.
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Window

attributes.content: Yeah, I did, but the app froze on me when I was wrapping up yesterday. I went out for dinner while waiting for it to unfreeze, and by the time I got back...
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Window

attributes.content: Ahhh—! Stop it. That's enough. Say no more!
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Window

attributes.content: Stop!
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Window

attributes.content: Wait, stop—! Stop moving around so much when you're clutching your head! My tablet's over there!
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Window

attributes.content: It's gone... It's all gone... How come I'm so unlucky today...?
attributes.name: Voice Behind the Window

attributes.content: Report. The crossbowmen have the high ground. No one has spotted us.
attributes.name: Fully-Armed Soldier

attributes.content: Standing by for orders.
attributes.name: Fully-Armed Soldier

attributes.content: Haah... What a busy day this has been... What time is it? Good, still got time. I'll head to the city for a drink.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Yow!
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Who would leave such a big rock out in the middle of the road? So inconsiderate.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Urgh... What's with everything today? Nothing's going right. I gotta find a fortune teller tomorrow and do something about my rotten luck.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Sorry about this, señor, but you'll have to go back. No one is allowed outside.
attributes.name: Armed Soldier

attributes.content: Who are you? What gives you the right to stop me?
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Turn around, señor.
attributes.name: Armed Soldier

attributes.content: Hey, who are you people? Who sent you?
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: That's close enough, señor.
attributes.name: Armed Soldier

attributes.content: Soon, more soldiers in uniforms, all with stern expressions and armaments, emerge from all the streets and alleys around them and surround the neighborhood.
A few black trucks drive between them, churning a flurry of dust.
The men start unloading the trucks' contents masterfully. The sky may already be getting dark, but the objects they unload are shiningly bright.
They start to unfurl rolls of barbed wire in front of everyone, enveloping the whole community.
What are you doing...?
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Señor, this is just a routine fire inspection. No need to be alarmed.
attributes.name: Armed Soldier

attributes.content: We will... greatly appreciate your cooperation.
attributes.name: Armed Soldier
